Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the number and duties of assistant principals to be assigned to the schools in the city school district of the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the number and duties of assistant principals to be assigned to the schools in the city school district of the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the number and duties of assistant principals to be assigned to the schools in the city school district of the city of New York
